bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of swollen testicles. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry hai zao 海藻：療疝氣下墜疼痛，核腫 , “It cures elevation-illness qi that has sunken [into the testicles] and creates pain with kernel swelling ”.

② Pathological Condition identical with zhong he 腫核 , swelling with kernels. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mao 貓 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 治鼠瘺核腫，或已潰出膿血者，取貓肉如常作羹，空心食 之，云不傳之法也 , “To cure mouse fistula with kernel swelling , and also those cases which have opened to release pus and blood, take cat meat and prepare an ordinary thick soup to be consumed on an empty stomach. This is a method that is not supposed to be transferred to others”.
